issue.title: [CF 185] debuffs:BleedDamageTaken outdated
issue.body:
Trauma no longer exists since cataclysm, please add Blood Frenzy instead.

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Skudnfroodie | Imported from CurseForge issue #185 | Raw

comments.body:
Yes it does. Blood frenzy is the 4% physical damage increase, trauma is the 30% bleed damage increase.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
